entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sheet Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:48 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malay Falls 9:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
